name: Low Cal Refreshing Salad
description: Dive into a fresh and Healthyfied journey with our Low Cal Refreshing Salad! Perfect for those who relish balanced meals, this salad is packed with high-fiber ingredients and a tantalizing mix that caters to your health-conscious palate. Ideal for anyone looking for Healthy Recipes without compromising on flavor. Its vibrant ingredients, including carrots, lettuce, hard-boiled eggs, cucumber, almonds, Alaskan crab flavored sticks, and young corn, make it a delightful choice for a nutritious meal.
recipeIngredient: 1 large egg, Egg Hard Boiled Large
2  sticks (86 g), Ichiban Alaskan Crab Flavored

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and chop the Ice Burg Lettuce.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Ichiban Alaskan Crab Flavored sticks.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and slice the young corn.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a large salad bowl, combine the sliced carrot, chopped lettuce, sliced cucumber, chopped almonds, sliced crab flavored sticks, sliced young corn, and sliced hard-boiled egg. Toss gently to mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately for the freshest taste. Enjoy your Low Cal Refreshing Salad!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
